portfolio.title: Connect Four
portfolio.overview: Classic Connect Four: Two players take turns putting pieces on the board, the first player to achieve a row of horizontal, vertical or diagonal pieces wins. Play with the mouse, or press left/right arrows and enter to play with the keyboard. Activate the dark mode by pressing 'n' on the keyboard.
